activities:
Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliates ("Take-Two US Group") collect, use and process human resources personal data received from Austria, Belgium, the Czech Republic, France, Germany, the Netherlands, Spain and the United Kingdom for the following purposes: Workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects; Compensation, including stock plan administration, compensation analysis, and benchmarking; Payroll processing; Performance management; Succession planning; Benefits and personnel administration, such as: Leave entitlements, Bonuses, Job recruiting and placement; IT support services; 
Monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures and applicable law; and Job leveling.

The privacy policy for human resources personal data is distributed internally to employees.

Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. ("Take-Two, Inc.") also collects, uses and processes online personal data for the following purposes: multiple websites and services offering memberships, email lists, send a friend options, forums, and other features that allow users to submit personal data.
